title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives in the View Management module, the view maximized state is lost.
OB: The bug manifests when changing perspectives in View Management, resulting in the loss of the maximized state for the current view.
EB: Upon switching perspectives, the view should retain its maximized state, ensuring a consistent user experience.
SR:
1. Investigate and identify the root cause of the maximized state loss when switching perspectives.
2. Implement a fix to preserve the maximized state during perspective changes.
3. Conduct thorough testing to ensure the issue is resolved without introducing new bugs.
